h3_title: Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Macaque Chief (First Encounter)
content: As you head to the end of the raised platform, you'll find a snowy sloping path off to the right, and another stairway path going straight ahead.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Snowhill_Path_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Snowhill Path Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Frost-Clad Path' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Macaque Chief (First Encounter)'.
The content is as follows:
As you head to the end of the raised platform, you'll find a snowy sloping path off to the right, and another stairway path going straight ahead.
